ETYMOLOGY: From Latin post meridiem (post 'after' + meridiem 'noon, midday').

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Abbreviation functioning as an adverbial modifier
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Abbreviation for post meridiem, used to specify the time period from 12:00 noon up to 12:00 midnight.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: post meridiem 的缩写，意为“下午”或“晚上”。用于表示中午12点到午夜12点之间的时间。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We plan to leave the city at 5 p.m. to avoid rush hour traffic.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们计划在下午5点离开城市以避开高峰期的交通。
